TopicTitle: List of Ideas For New Features.

Articles.Content:
Thought I'd share with you guys some of my ideas for new features for KSP. And as you can see, I've got a lot of 'em. I know some of them may be or are already established in mods, but regardless, I would love to see these in future patches.

Features

- Orbital Colonies

- Generation Ships (Long-distance starships operated by the fully awake crew members and their descendants)

- Sleeper Ships (Long-distance starships where the crew is kept in cryogenic stasis)

- Zero-gravity construction

- Advanced EVA exoskeletons

- Orbital Elevators

- Military Ships

- Satellite Lasers

- Munar Rovers

- Munbases

- Asteroid Mining

- Deep space travel

- Rare alien artifacts that give access to advanced and unique parts

- Solar Sails

- FTL Travel

- "Piggyback" takeoffs (Spaceplanes that lift off from the back of regular airplanes)

Scenery

- If Kerbonauts safely land on Kerbin, but are too far away from the space center or any cities, they will set up a small makeshift campsite

- Alien ruins on Mun and other planets (Like the infamous Cydonia Mensae, better known as the "Face of Mars")

- Flag of Kerbin on the site of the first successful Mun landing

- Gravesites for Kerbonauts KIA

Spacecraft/Space Station parts

- Colony Module

- Rec Module

- Probe Launcher

- Lab Module

- Gym Module

- Forge Module

- Observatory

- Satellite Launcher

- Communications Array

- Tourist Module

- Heat Shield

- Inflatable Landing Gear

- Laser

- Fuel Synthesizer (Slowly replenishes fuel)

- Arboretum

Space Center:

- Research and Development (Makes new tech)

- Training Center

Easter Eggs:

- UFOs

- Ghost Ships (Green, glowing transparent versions of ships that have crashed)

- Alien ruins on planets

- Sometimes, if a Crewmember dies onboard a ship, a Bagpipe rendition of "Amazing Grace" will be heard

Hi Zed, from a Z to another, welcome to the forums! This said, maybe take a look around before posting, as most of these features have been either (a) suggested time and time again before or ( are specifically in the "DO NOT SUGGEST" list. I'm not one to freak out about it, but some forum members are really testy (I guess because it keeps happening a lot).

This would also belong in the Development->Suggestions thread. Where you will see sticky posts indicating rules for suggesting stuff.

you really should look around the forums before you post something like this, there are many mods/plugins out there which already have the function of some of those features

Features

- Generation Ships (Long-distance starships operated by the fully awake crew members and their descendants) - not really much point since we only have the mun and minimus

- Sleeper Ships (Long-distance starships where the crew is kept in cryogenic stasis) - not really much point since we only have the mun and minimus

- Zero-gravity construction - Orbital Constuciton Mod

- Advanced EVA exoskeletons

- Orbital Elevators - this is impossible to mod, but perhaps maybe in a future update

- Military Ships - you can fit guns and missiles to ships.

- Satellite Lasers - been made, go search the forums

- Munar Rovers - been made, go search the forums

- Munbases - there are plenty of parts you can use to make your own

- Asteroid Mining - try the kethane mod

- Deep space travel - no planets to travel to yet

- Rare alien artifacts that give access to advanced and unique parts - doubt it will ever happen

- Solar Sails - most probably already created, if not you can use an ion engine

- FTL Travel - whats the point, you might as well just use the insta orbit to get into different planets orbits

- "Piggyback" takeoffs (Spaceplanes that lift off from the back of regular airplanes) - you can do this.....if your skilled enough

Spacecraft/Space Station parts

- Colony Module - made to some degree, go find it

- Rec Module - made to some degree, go find it

- Probe Launcher - several are avalible

- Lab Module - made to some degree, go find it

- Gym Module - would serve no purpose

- Forge Module - would serve no purpose

- Observatory - would serve no purpose

- Satellite Launcher - same as probe launcher

- Communications Array - already made, go find it

- Tourist Module - would serve no purpose

- Heat Shield - not implimented yet

- Inflatable Landing Gear - already made, go find it

- Laser - already made

- Fuel Synthesizer (Slowly replenishes fuel) - already made, go find it

- Arboretum - would serve no purpose

Space Center:

- Research and Development (Makes new tech) - future update...maybe

- Training Center - would serve no purpose

Easter Eggs:

- UFOs - future update...maybe

- Ghost Ships (Green, glowing transparent versions of ships that have crashed) - would serve no purpose

- Alien ruins on planets - already made, go find it

- Sometimes, if a Crewmember dies onboard a ship, a Bagpipe rendition of "Amazing Grace" will be heard - would serve no purpose
